sentences.en: A new force ( e . g . a school of thought , etc. ) emerged unexpectedly.
He shrank back ( in shame , horror , etc. ).
His room was jam-packed with fruit, flowers, gifts etc.
sentences.cn: 他的房间里堆满了水果、鲜花及礼品等。

sentences.en: In some words in English the initial h is not sounded,as honour,hour,honesty,etc.
sentences.cn: 英语里有些词如 honour，hour，honesty等等的首字h不发音。

sentences.en: Painting sculpture architecture etc. are collectively called the " fine arts " or " plastic arts " .
sentences.cn: 绘画、雕塑、建筑等统称为 造型艺术.

sentences.en: Plastics are used in many modern articles instead of metal, wood, etc.
sentences.cn: 塑料在许多现代用品中被用来代替金属 、 木材等.

sentences.en: Remember to take some paper, a pen, etc.
She knew all about my schoolwork, my hospital work etc.
sentences.cn: 她知道有关我的学业、医院工作等所有的一切。

sentences.en: She talks about nothing but food and clothing, etc.
This area has a high incidence of crime, disease, unemployment, etc.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的犯罪率 、 发病率 、 失业率等很高.
显示出对艺术等的偏好

sentences.en: to drive, etc. at breakneck speed
To this class of substance belong mica, porcelain, quartz, glass, wood, etc.
sentences.cn: 属于这类物质的有云母 、 瓷器 、 石英 、 玻璃 、 木材等等.

sentences.en: We had better buy tea, sugar, etc.
sentences.cn: 我们最好买些茶 、 糖等等.

sentences.en: You hang up hurriedly and attend to baby, crockery, etc.
sentences.cn: 你慌忙挂上电话,去照料孩子, 去收拾陶器, 等等.

trans.tran_cn: [拉丁语]et cetera（常读作 and so forth）
